mapper.select: select temp_id, temp_ill, temp_time, cost_level, comment from register_template where temp_id = #{tempId}
mapper.insert: insert into register_template(temp_ill, temp_time, cost_level, comment) values (#{tempIll}, #{tempTime}, #{costLevel}, #{comment})

insert into register_template(temp_ill, temp_time, cost_level, comment) values
(#{entity.tempIll}, #{entity.tempTime}, #{entity.costLevel}, #{entity.comment})

insert into register_template(temp_ill, temp_time, cost_level, comment) values
(#{entity.tempIll}, #{entity.tempTime}, #{entity.costLevel}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update temp_ill = values(temp_ill), temp_time = values(temp_time), cost_level = values(cost_level), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update register_template
temp_ill = #{tempIll},
temp_time = #{tempTime},
cost_level = #{costLevel},
comment = #{comment},
where temp_id = #{tempId}
